title: TouchDesigner Workshop: Generative Visuals
short_description: Learn real-time generative visuals with TouchDesigner operators and data flow programming. Perfect for beginners.
description: Learn to create real-time generative visuals using TouchDesigner's operators and data flow programming

title: Live Cinema: Data Flows
short_description: Immersive AV performance mixing live coding with TouchDesigner real-time graphics. Experience cutting-edge visual art.
description: Immersive audiovisual performance combining live coding and TouchDesigner real-time graphics

title: AV Meetup Berlin October
short_description: Monthly gathering for AV artists and TouchDesigner enthusiasts. Network, share projects, and learn from the community.
description: Monthly meetup for audiovisual artists and TouchDesigner enthusiasts. Bring your projects!

title: Projection Mapping Workshop
short_description: Hands-on projection mapping with TouchDesigner and MadMapper. Transform spaces with interactive light projections.
description: Hands-on workshop covering projection mapping techniques with TouchDesigner and MadMapper

title: Algorithmic Creatures
short_description: Interactive installation with AI-generated creatures rendered live in TouchDesigner. Watch digital life evolve.
description: Interactive installation featuring AI-generated creatures rendered in real-time with TouchDesigner

title: TouchDesigner + Ableton Live
short_description: Live AV performance connecting TouchDesigner visuals with Ableton music. See sound and sight merge in real-time.
description: Performance exploring the connection between TouchDesigner visuals and Ableton Live music production

title: Berlin AV Festival Opening
short_description: Opening night of Berlin's premier AV festival with TouchDesigner installations. Celebrate the city's digital art scene.
description: Opening night of Berlin's premier audiovisual festival featuring TouchDesigner-powered installations

title: Real-time Graphics Showcase
short_description: Local artists showcase TouchDesigner real-time graphics projects. Discover innovative digital art from Berlin creators.
description: Showcase of real-time graphics projects created with TouchDesigner by local artists
